channel.title: Features :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: The V2.1.X features are : Multiple firmwares support: Repetier, Marlin, Smoothieware and GRBL. Multiple languages support Full WiFi configuration of ESP3D settings including web update Control and monitor your connected board and firmware in every aspect (position, temperature, print, SD card content, custom commands, etcâ€¦) Macro support to add custom commands in WebUI by adding buttons launching some GCODE files from SD or ESP IP Camera support.
